Question 43.Question: Why didnâ€™t you use GenAI for feedback on your work?
Question 43.Response:
At this stage of AI development, I don't trust its guidance on my work. GenAI produces inhuman, very formulaic writing that I personally do not think is beneficial. 
Additionally, I have heard of some AI tools holding data to learn from and I do not want my academic work to be held.
